about.title: About
about.description: Fullstack developer and illustrator, I combine technical rigor and artistic creativity.
about.bio: Fullstack developer for 3 years, specialized in microservices architecture (Rust, GraphQL, Next.js). Coming from a nurse → dev career change in 2022, I developed a rigorous and collaborative approach to software development. Drawn to complex technical challenges and continuous improvement. Also passionate about illustration and comics, I've been practicing watercolor and digital drawing for several years.
